title: Palau’s Successful Pilot: Ripple-Supported Stablecoin Gains Traction
description: The Ministry of Finance in Palau has declared the first phase of its Palau Stablecoin (PSC) Program a resounding success. The program pegged to the U.S. dollar, garnered positive responses from 168 volunteers  who engaged in retail purchases using the Palau Stablecoin over three months. In collaboration with Ripple, the initiative utilized the XRP Ledger ... Read more

title: U.S., South Korea, and Japan unite against North Korea crypto thefts
description: In a recent trilateral meeting, high-level national security officials from the United States, South Korea, and Japan convened to address the growing concern over North Korea’s utilization of cryptocurrency thefts to fund its nuclear and ballistic missile programs. The meeting, held in Seoul, South Korea, involved U.S. National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan, Republic of Korea ... Read more

title: AI Poised to Revolutionize Climate Forecasting and Mitigation Efforts
description: In late October, a devastating storm struck northern Italy, causing Lake Como and the Seveso River to overflow this event served as a stark reminder of the increasing vulnerability of areas worldwide to extreme weather events driven by climate change. As global warming triggers more frequent and destructive storms, floods, heatwaves, and droughts, experts are ... Read more

title: AI-Powered Cameras to Target and Ticket Bus Lane Offenders in Los Angeles
description: Los Angeles, CA – A groundbreaking artificial intelligence (AI) system is set to revolutionize the enforcement of bus lanes in Los Angeles. Similar to systems already in operation in San Francisco and Washington, D.C., this innovative technology employs 100 AI-equipped cameras strategically placed in the windshields of Metro buses. title: FTX and Alameda Move $23.59M to Exchanges and Galaxy Digital OTC
description:
According to Spot On Chain, a blockchain analytical firm, FTX and Alameda Research moved out $23.59 million worth of 19 assets to Binance, Coinbase, OKX, and GalaxyDigital OTC in the past four days. The firm posted on X (formerly Twitter) that the digital assets involved in the transaction include ETH, ALEPH, CRV, LINK, and many […]
